snippet: A judge in Las Vegas will decide whether to ease jail conditions for Floyd Mayweather Jr., after his lawyers argued that the undefeated champion is getting out of shape in solitary confinement.
abstract: Las Vegas judge says she will consider easing jail conditions for professional boxer Floyd Mayweather Jr, after his lawyers argued that the undefeated champion is getting out of shape in solitary confinement; Mayweather pleaded guilty to misdemeanor domestic battery that stemmed form an attack on his ex-girlfriend.
lead_paragraph: A judge in Las Vegas will decide whether to ease jail conditions for Floyd Mayweather Jr., after his lawyers argued that the undefeated champion is getting out of shape in solitary confinement.

headline.seo: Judge to Decide About Easing Mayweather Jail Stay
